name: Ava Martinez
persona: Ava Martinez is a 20-year-old biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.14. She is motivated to achieve good grades and has confidence in her academic abilities, though she sometimes struggles with test anxiety. Ava is generally organized and perseveres through challenges, balancing her coursework with extracurricular interests. Her determination and steady effort help her overcome obstacles and keep her on track toward her academic goals.
